name: css-node-extract
description: Extract certain nodes from CSS code
author: Markus Oberlehner

scripts.scripts:bundle: rm -R dist && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/extract-node-recursively.js js/lib/extract-node-recursively.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/filter-definitions.js js/lib/filter-definitions.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/node-matches-filter.js js/lib/node-matches-filter.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/postcss-node-extract.js js/lib/postcss-node-extract.js
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bundle && npm run scripts:lint-no-error
